job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and enhancing AI models (LLMs) for a specific application (autonomous support platforms).

job_tasks.phrase: troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools in a production environment falls under the operational aspects of managing AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Developing a functional assistant to guide users through a process is a software development task that leverages AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer,
job_tasks.justification: Testing and integrating specific AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and CodeWhisperer falls under the modeling and application of AI.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how AI technologies can be applied to improve internal team workflows and providing guidance, which is a business-oriented task.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and enhancing the performance of AI solutions is a core aspect of model improvement and tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring end-user support and service quality relates to the development and maintenance of user-facing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business impact and goals of the AI initiatives, aligning with business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI
bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?
providing support and guidance for internal teams

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and improving applications using LLMs, integrating specific GenAI technologies like GPT-4 Vision, and developing user-facing assistants. The core responsibilities align directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on generative models and the software systems around them.
